pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![iid-logo](https://iid.ulaval.ca/wp-content/themes/iid/images/logo-iid-Institut-intelligence-donnees.svg "IID")# TextStatComplexityHere some examples: from TextComplexityComputer import TextComplexityComputer tcc = TextComplexityComputer() print(tcc.get_metrics_scores("Alibaba et les 40 voleurs."))
